content: Remember you can also employ the Immobilize spell to keep him penned in if he strafes too much to hit, or you can use it to shut down his damaging roar or swipes so that you can interrupt his attack and hit him with a charged strike.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Lingxuzi.md', within the main section titled 'Lingxuzi', specifically from the subsection 'Lingxuzi Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Remember you can also employ the Immobilize spell to keep him penned in if he strafes too much to hit, or you can use it to shut down his damaging roar or swipes so that you can interrupt his attack and hit him with a charged strike.
